name: Templo
description:
Unreal Engine  | 1 Player | 2017

During 2017’s #blocktober I made a bunch of dungeon tiles for a randomly generated dungeon crawler. All of the assets came together in this small mockup of a game. There are still plans to use these tiles in a bigger project.

View all of my #blocktober 2017 tweets here:
https://twitter.com/i/moments/925861986029711361

Read a short interview I gave about this project here:
https://autofire.net/2017/11/08/for-the-love-of-gaming-developer-spotlight-jaspe...

CONTROLS
Walk: WASD
Potion:E
Jump: Spacebar
Attack: LMB
Boost: RMB
Cheat: J
Menu: P
